languages.text: {n}Сложно определить, насколько сильно ранен Скаландр. Ахиллеас все еще держится на ногах, однако сотни порезов и увечий покрывают все его тело. Было бы лучше как можно скорее доставить его в медблок, под присмотр лекарей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сложно определить, на сколько сильно ранен служитель Инквизиции. Ахиллеас все еще держится на ногах, однако сотни порезов и увечий покрывают все его тело. Было бы лучше как можно скорее доставить его в медблок, под присмотр лекарей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сложно определить, насколько сильно ранен Скаландр. Ахиллеас все еще держится на ногах, однако сотни порезов и увечий покрывают все его тело. Было бы лучше как можно скорее доставить его в медблок, под присмотр лекарей.{/n}

{n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

{n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アキレアスの負傷がどれほど酷いものなのか判断しがたかった。まだ立てるようだが、身体は無数の切り傷や打撲で覆われている。一刻も早くメディケア施設へ搬送し、癒し手の治療を受けるべきだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスの負傷がどれほど酷いものなのか判断しがたかった。まだ立てるようだが、身体は無数の切り傷や打撲で覆われている。一刻も早くメディケア施設へ搬送し、癒し手の治療を受けるべきだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你暂时无法评估阿吉里亚斯的伤势。他还能站起来，但全身上下布满了成百上千处伤口。最好能尽快将他送到医疗机构，接受专业治疗师的护理。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你暂时无法评估阿吉里亚斯的伤势。他还能站起来，但全身上下布满了成百上千处伤口。最好能尽快将他送到医疗机构，接受专业治疗师的护理。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es difícil evaluar la gravedad de sus heridas. Se tiene en pie, pero su cuerpo está cubierto de cortes y heridas. Sería recomendable trasladarlo a una instalación de medicae, al cuidado de los sanadores, lo antes posible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es difícil evaluar la gravedad de sus heridas. Se tiene en pie, pero su cuerpo está cubierto de cortes y heridas. Sería recomendable trasladarlo a una instalación de medicae, al cuidado de los sanadores, lo antes posible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il est difficile d'évaluer la gravité des blessures d'Achilleas. Il tient debout, mais son corps est couvert de centaines d'entailles et de contusions. Il vaudrait mieux l'emmener à une infirmerie au plus vite, pour qu'il soit examiné par des professionnels.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est difficile d'évaluer la gravité des blessures d'Achilleas. Il tient debout, mais son corps est couvert de centaines d'entailles et de contusions. Il vaudrait mieux l'emmener à une infirmerie au plus vite, pour qu'il soit examiné par des professionnels.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist kaum einzuschätzen, wie schwer Achilleas verwundet ist. Er kann noch stehen, aber sein Körper ist mit Hunderten von Schnitten und Verletzungen übersät. Am besten bringt man ihn so schnell wie möglich in eine Medicae-Einrichtung zu Heilern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist kaum einzuschätzen, wie schwer Achilleas verwundet ist. Er kann noch stehen, aber sein Körper ist mit Hunderten von Schnitten und Verletzungen übersät. Am besten bringt man ihn so schnell wie möglich in eine Medicae-Einrichtung zu Heilern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Achilleas'ın ne durumda olduğunu söylemek zor. Ayakta durabiliyor ama bedeninde yüzlerce kesik ve yara var. Bir an evvel sıhhiyeye nakledilip şifacılara emanet edilmesi, en iyisi olur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It's difficult to assess how badly Achilleas is wounded. He can still stand, but his body is covered in hundreds of cuts and injuries. It would be best if he were transported to a medicae facility, into the care of healers, as soon as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas'ın ne durumda olduğunu söylemek zor. Ayakta durabiliyor ama bedeninde yüzlerce kesik ve yara var. Bir an evvel sıhhiyeye nakledilip şifacılara emanet edilmesi, en iyisi olur.{/n}
